room_description: This room has one Double sized bed. It is one size smaller than the standard room. It has a shower and doesn't have a bathtub.
This room has one Semi Double sized bed. It has a shower and doesn't have a bathtub.

You can choose from the following types of room.
- one Double sized bed Room
- Twin bed Room
The standard room has a bathtub.

You can choose from the following types of room.
- One Double sized bed Room
- Twin bed Room Deluxe Room and higher have a bathtub made of stone.

You can choose from the following types of room.
- One Double sized bed Room.
- Twin bed Room .

This room is more spacious than the Deluxe Room, so you can be more comfortable.
This room has One Queen Sized Bed. It has a kitchen where you can cook by yourself in this room.

You can choose from the following types of room.

- One Bed Room (Room has one Queen sized bed).
- Twin Bed Room (Room has one queen sized bed plus one single sized bed).

This room is much bigger than the Deluxe Plus, and has a very comfortable sofa.

You can choose from one queen-size bed or twin beds.This room has a wide kitchen and a sofa set, and is the best room in Hotel asia. It is highly recommended for a long-term stay because you can relax comfortably here.
